name: comorderdetailsservice
description: A service to receive order detail events from COM and cache them in mongo.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=local profile=test nyc mocha -w --reporter spec --compilers ts:ts-node/register 'src/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.test:single: NODE_ENV=local profile=test nyc --reporter=lcovonly mocha --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --exit --compilers ts:ts-node/register 'src/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.start:local: concurrently --raw "gulp watch" "NODE_ENV=local profile=local timeout=5000 PORT=8080 KafkaTopic=COMOrderRecallPublish KafkaCluster=lpa839.homedepot.com:9092,lpa83a.homedepot.com:9092,lpa83b.homedepot.com:9092,lpa83c.homedepot.com:9092,lpa83d.homedepot.com:9092,lpa83e.homedepot.com:9092 MONGO_ENCRYPTED=true MONGO_URI=U2FsdGVkX19K4bD2Xkz0ZkTOykEzGiV67HRqblfN1wMMWQsyqnQsLcONzfZfaWtqBEboZXGTs1/T8Ayx3Gku5+ll3kkyhfyoxWPzd5G4AIh3SqdepL44+SW1EA2VoGevXRIycfGEfMdHMbGF7wdUVFjNGqTuZr+TMqdj0k7egVYsuUalOMHY5qIynkWxCispOwq7SgRKh9WPvcYt3oDCN4P3psa2XbcnpouT+qnwa4935aWdMei4Pnx+x2sZKvrw MONGO_DB=prrs1db83 TRACKING_SERVICE_API=http://TrackingService.apps.homedepot.com/api/v1/carrierevents nodemon ./dist/server.js --use_strict"
